 2001-16372001-09-200TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE RESTRAINT SYSTEMS AND BOOSTER CUSHIONS SAFETY REGULATIONS by (a) allowing manufacturers of certain types of restraint systems and booster cushions (i) to supply their customers with a tether strap and provide installation instructions on the label thereof, and (ii) to incorporate a tether-webbing adjustment mechanism into the tether hook, and (b) by harmonizing dynamic test specifications and procedures with the ones used in the United States.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0341 Publication Date: 2001-10-10
